# Athom Homey RF Signal Analyzer

Automatically record & analyze rf signals.

## Information
Predicts a [signal definition](https://developer.athom.com/docs/apps/tutorial-Signals-Creating%20a%20Signal.html) based on this guide [how to record a signal](https://github.com/athombv/node-homey-433/wiki/How-to-record-a-signal).  
The output can be used to create an Athom Homey [RF Driver](https://github.com/athombv/node-homey-rfdriver).

## See it in action
*Open in browser:* **[index.html](http://htmlpreview.github.io/?https://github.com/saiaman/Athom-Homey-RF-Signal-Analyzer/blob/master/index.html)**.

## Demo signals
Try pasting these demo signals into the `signal recording data` field.

##### From guide
```javascript
[[255, 400, 110, 1002, 1100, 111, 108, 1010, 102, 1004, 1089, 109, 1102, 112, 110, 1004, 230]]
```

The repository is available at: https://github.com/harriedegroot/Athom-Homey-RF-Signal-Analyzer
